articles.title: Oil firms, Asia shares drop as Ukraine talks make little progress - Reuters.com
articles.description: Oil prices firmed and Asian shares fell on Tuesday as Ukraine peace talks made little headway and the prospect of a ban on oil imports from Russia triggered investor fears over inflation and slowing economic growth.
